column1: Kata Robata////My original intention for coming here was to try their ramen. I was on a ramen kick that week (tried ramen bar uchi and agu ramen)
column2: but my bf and I ended up ordering sushi and it did not disappoint! I'm not a big fan of sushi but their sushi
column4: had the perfect filling to rice ratio
column5: and was flavorful enough that I didn't require any soy sauce for dipping. It was perfect!
